Office Phone: handyDART Office:  250.762.3278 (DO NOT call this number to book a taxi - call the cab company of your choice)
Service Details: - Offers vouchers that provide a 50% subsidy towards the cost of taxi rides to permanently registered handyDART riders ONLY- To book a taxi, please call the taxi cab company of your choice- Be sure to confirm that the company accepts Taxi Saver vouchers
Eligibility: To use the Taxi Saver Program, users must be registered handyDART clients
How to Apply: For more information, please visit the website to download the handyDART application, or call the handyDART office at 250.762.3278
Address & Map: 1494 Hardy StKelowna, BC     V1Y 8H2View MapQuest Map
